name: Idle Settler
description:
Idle Settler is a simple resource management. In this game you must survive as long as you can using just peasant and farm. While you will encounter enemies and disaster in the game.

How to play

  • You can found your current card in bottom UI of the game.
  • Click it anywhere you want.
  • You can only place one card each day.
  • And survive as long as you  can.
